name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CareerOS - Save Jobs & Contacts with Ease

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will help you to save companies, jobs and contacts to your CareerOS overview board.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Created for CareerOS students to save vacancies, companies and contacts from LinkedIn to their account easier. Using this Chrome Extension, users will be able to save the detailed description of a job, company or contact in two clicks in order to further interact with this data for a job search using CareerOS Web App.

**The CareerOS Chrome Extension is only available to partner universities. If you would like to connect us with your university to gain access, please fill out this form: https://tinyurl.com/4uxhtu7f **
